title: Ep 71: Hate Beat
itunes:author: Desus Nice & THE KID MERO
itunes:summary:
The brand is strong! The Bronx's very own Desus Nice & THE KID MERO aka the Bodega Boys (from Desus & Mero on Viceland) are giving you their irreverent yet hilarious takes on all things pop culture. Recorded at Red Bull Studios in NYC.

This week: Sinbad, Rob K, Blak Chyna, that pitbull from an earlier episode, sloppy toppy and more!
